channel.title: Logs on Stephen Malina
channel.description: Recent content in Logs on Stephen Malina

item.title: Daily - 2019-07-10
item.description: Not nearly as productive as yesterday. Spent a bunch of time reading about synthetic biology in the morning rather than doing Calculus. Had a good session learning about probability. Was referred to Terry Tao’s notes on rigorous probability theory as a supplement to the book I’m reading. Feeling excited about diving into them. Got around half-way through Calculus Problem Set #2, hoping to finish tomorrow and maybe get in 1-2 lectures.

item.title: Daily - 2019-07-11
item.description: Post-Lunch So far, much more productive than yesterday, finished Problem Set #2 and went through the Exam 1 review lecture for Calculus. Currently debating whether I should take the exam today or wait until tomorrow. I’d like to do some probability, but also want to make sure I’m making adequate progress, in particular while my motivation’s still relatively high. In the afternoon, I’m going to try to finish the probability exercises from Section 1.
